Function Documentation

int32_t CSL_cbassQosGetEpriority ( const CSL_cbass_qosRegs_ep *  pQosEpRegs,
uint32_t  channel,
uint32_t *  pEpriority 
)

Get the CBASS master epriority signal value for given channel.

Parameters
pQosEpRegsPointer (of type CSL_cbass_qosRegs_ep *) to the base address of the CBASS QoS module.
channelChannel number for which to get epriority.
pEpriorityPointer to epriority for given channel
Returns
status CBASS QoS epriority get status. CSL_PASS: success CSL_EBADARGS: failure, indicate the bad input arguments
int32_t CSL_cbassQosGetOrderID ( const CSL_cbass_qosRegs_ep *  pQosEpRegs,
uint32_t  channel,
uint32_t *  pOrderId 
)

Get the CBASS master QoS Order ID for given channel.

Parameters
pQosEpRegsPointer (of type CSL_cbass_qosRegs_ep *) to the base address of the CBASS QoS module.
channelChannel number for which to get Order ID.
pOrderIdPointer to order ID for given channel
Returns
status CBASS QoS order ID get status. CSL_PASS: success CSL_EBADARGS: failure, indicate the bad input arguments
int32_t CSL_cbassQosGetQos ( const CSL_cbass_qosRegs_ep *  pQosEpRegs,
uint32_t  channel,
uint32_t *  pQosVal 
)

Get the CBASS master QoS signal for given channel.

Parameters
pQosEpRegsPointer (of type CSL_cbass_qosRegs_ep *) to the base address of the CBASS QoS module.
channelChannel number for which to get QoS value.
pQosValPointer to QoS signal value for given channel
Returns
status CBASS QoS value get status. CSL_PASS: success CSL_EBADARGS: failure, indicate the bad input arguments
int32_t CSL_cbassQosReadStaticRegs ( const CSL_cbass_qosRegs_ep *  pQosEpRegs,
CSL_cbass_qosRegs_ep *  pStaticRegs 
)

This API is used to read static registers of CBASS QoS module. This API needs to be called after the initial configuration is done and hence mutliple read between static registers do not change the values.

Parameters
pQosEpRegsPointer (of type CSL_cbass_qosRegs_ep *) to the base address of the CBASS QoS module.
pStaticRegspointer to static registers to be read
Returns
CSL_PASS - success CSL_EBADARGS - API fails due to bad input arguments
int32_t CSL_cbassQosSetEpriority ( const CSL_cbass_qosRegs_ep *  pQosEpRegs,
uint32_t  channel,
uint32_t  epriority 
)

Configure the CBASS master epriority signal for given channel.

Parameters
pQosEpRegsPointer (of type CSL_cbass_qosRegs_ep *) to the base address of the CBASS QoS module.
channelChannel number for which epriority to be configured.
epriorityEpriority vlaue for given channel
Returns
status CBASS QoS epriority configuration status. CSL_PASS: success CSL_EBADARGS: failure, indicate the bad input arguments
int32_t CSL_cbassQosSetOrderID ( const CSL_cbass_qosRegs_ep *  pQosEpRegs,
uint32_t  channel,
uint32_t  orderId 
)

Configure the CBASS master QoS Order ID for given channel.

Parameters
pQosEpRegsPointer (of type CSL_cbass_qosRegs_ep *) to the base address of the CBASS QoS module.
channelChannel number for which Order ID to be configured.
orderIdOrder ID for given channel
Returns
status CBASS QoS order ID value configuration status. CSL_PASS: success CSL_EBADARGS: failure, indicate the bad input arguments
int32_t CSL_cbassQosSetQos ( const CSL_cbass_qosRegs_ep *  pQosEpRegs,
uint32_t  channel,
uint32_t  qosVal 
)

Configure the CBASS master QoS signal for given channel.

Parameters
pQosEpRegsPointer (of type CSL_cbass_qosRegs_ep *) to the base address of the CBASS QoS module.
channelChannel number for which QoS value to be configured.
qosValQoS signal value for given channel
Returns
status CBASS QoS value configuration status. CSL_PASS: success CSL_EBADARGS: failure, indicate the bad input arguments
